com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.serialization

Class StringBasedErpType<T extends StringBasedErpType<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.serialization.StringBasedErpType<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErpType<T>, StringRepresentableKey, Serializable, Comparable<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Account, AccountType, AssetClass, BankAccount, BankInternalId, BankStatementId, ChartOfAccounts, Company, CompanyCode, ControllingArea, CostCenter, Currency, DistributionChannel, Division, DocumentItemNumber, DocumentNumber, ExchangeRateType, FinancialTransaction, FixedAsset, InternalOrder, InternalOrderType, LanguageKey, MasterFixedAsset, ObjectNumber, PaymentAdvice, PaymentAdviceItem, PaymentAdviceType, Period, PersonnelNumber, ProfitCenter, SalesDocumentItemNumber, SalesDocumentType, SalesOrganization, SapClient

    public abstract class StringBasedErpType<T extends StringBasedErpType<T>>
extends Object
implements ErpType<T>, Comparable<T>, StringRepresentableKey
    Base class for string-based ERP types.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringBasedErpType

        public StringBasedErpType(String value)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new string-based type.
        Parameters:
        value - The value of the type (not null). The given string is trimmed. An empty or trimmed empty value results in an empty instance of the string-based type.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given value cannot be converted to an instance of this type.

      • StringBasedErpType

        public StringBasedErpType(String value,
                          StringBasedErpType.CharCasing charCasing)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new string-based type with a certain character casing.
        Parameters:
        value - The value of the type (not null). The given string is trimmed. An empty or trimmed empty value results in an empty instance of the string-based type.
        charCasing - Defines the casing of characters within the string.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given value cannot be converted to an instance of this type.
